title: Tirupati Balaji South India Tour
description: Outline Itinerary Day 1: Arrival in Chennai – Transfer to Tirupati Day 2: Tirupati – Tirumala Darshan Day 3: Tirupati to Pondicherry Day 4: Pondicherr...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrival in Chennai – Transfer to Tirupati
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Your journey begins with your arrival at Chennai airport or railway station, where you will be
greeted and assisted for your onward drive to Tirupati, the sacred town famous for the Lord
Venkateshwara Temple. After reaching Tirupati, check into your hotel and relax after the journey.
Take this day to unwind or explore the surroundings at your leisure. Enjoy dinner and an
overnight stay at Tirupati .

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Tirupati – Tirumala Darshan
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Start your day with a hearty breakfast at the hotel before heading to the Tirumala Hills, where
you will visit the renowned Lord Venkateshwara Temple. Experience the divine atmosphere and
seek blessings at this iconic pilgrimage site, often referred to as the “Temple of Seven Hills.”
Spend the day immersed in spiritual activities and return to your hotel in the evening for dinner
and an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Tirupati to Pondicherry
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Pondicherry, a charming coastal town known for its
French colonial architecture and serene ambiance. Upon arrival, begin your exploration with
visits to the Manakula Vinayagar Temple, Auroville Matrimandir, and the Sri Aurobindo Ashram,
each offering a unique spiritual and cultural experience. Later, enjoy the tranquil backwaters at
Chunnambar and relax at Paradise Beach and Promenade Beach, soaking in the beauty of the
coastline. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Pondicherry.

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Pondicherry to Madurai
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Post breakfast, check out and drive to Madurai, a historic city and one of India’s oldest
continuously inhabited places. Upon arrival, check into your hotel and freshen up. Begin your
sightseeing with a visit to the Thirumalai Nayak Palace, known for its stunning Dravidian and
Rajput architectural fusion. Later, visit the magnificent Meenakshi Amman Temple, a
masterpiece of South Indian temple architecture. End your day with dinner and an overnight
stay in Madurai.

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Madurai to Rameshwaram
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Rameshwaram, a significant pilgrimage destination
and part of the Char Dham Yatra. En route, stop to admire the engineering marvels of the
Pamban Bridge and Pamban Rail Scissors Bridge, which connect the island of Rameshwaram
to the mainland. On arrival, check into your hotel and relax. Spend the evening exploring the
town or preparing for the next day’s temple visits. Overnight stay in Rameshwaram.

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Rameshwaram & Dhanushkodi Excursion
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Begin your day early with a holy dip at Agni Theertham, followed by rituals and darshan at the
Ramanatha Swami Temple, renowned for its 22 sacred wells. After breakfast, visit nearby
attractions including Parvathavarthini Amman Temple, Ramar Patham, Lakshmana Theertham,
Seetha Theertham, and the Panchmukhi Hanuman Temple. Later, take an excursion to
Dhanushkodi, a ghost town with stunning beaches and historical ruins. Return to Rameshwaram
for dinner and an overnight stay

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Rameshwaram to Kanyakumari
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Post breakfast, check out and drive to Kanyakumari, the southernmost tip of India. En route,
visit the Suchindram Thanumalayan Temple, a revered site known for its intricate carvings and
spiritual significance. On reaching Kanyakumari, check into your hotel and witness a
mesmerizing sunset at the Kanyakumari Beach. Overnight stay at Kanyakumari.

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Kanyakumari Sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Start your day early to witness a breathtaking sunrise at Triveni Sangamam, where the Arabian
Sea, Bay of Bengal, and the Indian Ocean meet. After breakfast, visit the Vivekananda Rock
Memorial, a serene monument built on a rocky islet, and the towering Thiruvalluvar Statue,
dedicated to the Tamil poet-saint. Spend the rest of the day exploring the town and soaking in its
cultural vibe. Overnight stay at Kanyakumari.

itinerary.title: Day 9
itinerary.description:
: Kanyakumari to Trivandrum
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Trivandrum (Thiruvananthapuram), the capital of
Kerala. On arrival, visit the famous Shri Padmanabhaswamy Temple, an architectural marvel
and one of the richest temples in the world. Later, explore the city’s attractions including the
Trivandrum Zoo and Museum, known for its diverse collection of flora and fauna. Overnight stay
in Trivandrum.

itinerary.title: Day 10
itinerary.description:
: Trivandrum Departure
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            On your final day, enjoy a leisurely breakfast and check out from the hotel. You will be
transferred to the Trivandrum airport or railway station for your onward journey, carrying with you
the memories of an enriching South India tour.
